sentence: And the Grand Canyon's State slate of Republican representatives — U.S. Reps. David Schweikert, Debbie Lesko, Paul Gosar and Andy Biggs — chimed in a day later.
author: Stacey Barchenger
title: Gov. Ducey sues Biden administration over funding tied to COVID-19 mandates and Arizona schools

sentence: Rep. Debbie Lesko, R-Ariz., didn't vote on that bill.
author: Ronald J. Hansen
title: Rep. Andy Biggs among few to oppose bill suspending normal trade with Russia

sentence: (Note: Arizona Republican Rep. Debbie Lesko also voted not to support NATO.)
author: EJ Montini
title: 'Putinistas' Andy Biggs and Paul Gosar vote against bill to document Russian war crimes
